name: Guns Of Time
description:
You are set as A security officer in a deep underground lab. You are task in protecting the delicate experiment they are conducting with time itself, until one day something went wrong, you woke up and you see all your collogues have changed into some kind of monsters that want to kill you. You feel that you are changing, but you decide screw with this, and you will not succumb to this curse. You fight it and decide to fight everything and save the world from this new curse all before you die.

 

Soon you realize that the curse within you gave you a very unique ability the power over time itself. With this ability and your Standard issue rifle you are sure you can navigate the lab and find the source of this outbreak before it is too late

 

Guns Of Time is a FPS Game with parkour and puzzle elements mixed together for the Brackeys Jam 2020.2 based on the theme rewind. I spend a week developing this game. Please give me Any Feedback you can

the music in the game is Before I die by deadline an awesome South African band. This song is from their newest album called Cathedral Point released by BloodKrieg Records. https://www.facebook.com/DeadlineQ9/ go look at there music and enjoy every second of it.
